data.text:
"…Her Highness, studying abroad at Japan's Uma Musume Training 
Center School, attended a party at the Irish Embassy yesterday-"
data.name: TV Audio
data.processed:
<story>"…Her Highness, studying abroad at Japan's Uma Musume Training 
<story>Center School, attended a party at the Irish Embassy yesterday-"

data.text:
It all began on a certain day, early in the afternoon. I was 
walking home from the Electronics Store when I heard the TV.
data.processed:
<story>It all began on a certain day, early in the afternoon. I was 
<story>walking home from the Electronics Store when I heard the TV.

data.text:
Hmmmm, well now… -Ah! Excuse me, you there! 
Could I have a moment of your time?
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmm, well now… -Ah! Excuse me, you there! 
<story>Could I have a moment of your time?

data.text:
Yes, you! Fufu, I'm sorry for suddenly stopping you. 
I just had something I'd like to ask.
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Yes, you! Fufu, I'm sorry for suddenly stopping you. 
<story>I just had something I'd like to ask.

data.text:
Truth is, I wanted to try the "Eat-In Corner" at the convenience 
store, bought some cup ramen, took a seat and waited but-
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Truth is, I wanted to try the "Eat-In Corner" at the convenience 
<story>store, bought some cup ramen, took a seat and waited but-

data.text:
The person responsible for putting hot water in just hasn't come 
yet. Perhaps, today is a holiday?
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>The person responsible for putting hot water in just hasn't come 
<story>yet. Perhaps, today is a holiday?

data.text:
…I told this confused, mysterious girl, 
that the hot water was self service.
data.processed:
<story>…I told this confused, mysterious girl, 
<story>that the hot water was self service.

data.text:
Eh? It's fine to put the hot water in yourself? 
That… isn't that-!!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Eh? It's fine to put the hot water in yourself? 
<story>That… isn't that-!!

data.text:
Waa, for some reason I'm getting excited! 
And! And! Where is the hot water kept?!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Waa, for some reason I'm getting excited! 
<story>And! And! Where is the hot water kept?!

data.text:
Fuuaa, that was a lovely experience! To think you could eat at 
the same place you go shopping, how wonderful!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Fuuaa, that was a lovely experience! To think you could eat at 
<story>the same place you go shopping, how wonderful!

data.text:
Kind person, you have my gratitude 
for your help. And then next is-
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Kind person, you have my gratitude 
<story>for your help. And then next is-

data.text: Would you be so kind as to escort me to "Extreme Noodle Shop"?
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>Would you be so kind as to escort me to "Extreme Noodle Shop"?

data.text:
…Ah, I'm sorry! Ehehe, silly me. 
"Investigating the destination yourself" is normal, isn't it?
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>…Ah, I'm sorry! Ehehe, silly me. 
<story>"Investigating the destination yourself" is normal, isn't it?

data.text:
…That's certainly true but, seeing how naive she was earlier, I 
was a little hesitant to leave her be. That's why-

choices.text: Shall I take you to the shop?

data.processed:
<story>…That's certainly true but, seeing how naive she was earlier, I 
<story>was a little hesitant to leave her be. That's why-

data.text:
Fuuuuu~~~~~! 
-SEIYAAAA!!
data.name: Ramen Stallkeeper
data.processed:
<story>Fuuuuu~~~~~! 
<story>-SEIYAAAA!!

data.text:
Aaah! That… That's definitely the "Extreme" specialty, the "Hot 
Water Draining Cross"! Amazing, it's the real thing!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Aaah! That… That's definitely the "Extreme" specialty, the "Hot 
<story>Water Draining Cross"! Amazing, it's the real thing!

data.text:
Yeah! Using this technique they can completely separate the hot 
water from the rich, golden, chicken bone soup and so you can 
enjoy the noodles with no slimy texture, or so they say…!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! Using this technique they can completely separate the hot 
<story>water from the rich, golden, chicken bone soup and so you can 
<story>enjoy the noodles with no slimy texture, or so they say…!

data.text:
Ever since I saw it in a net article, I've always 
wanted to see it for myself! Haaaa… I've been 
waiting for this moment for 43 days…!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Ever since I saw it in a net article, I've always 
<story>wanted to see it for myself! Haaaa… I've been 
<story>waiting for this moment for 43 days…!

data.text:
Using force that could send hot water flying, filling 
the store with steam… and the anticipation, it's 
all more than I could have imagined!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>Using force that could send hot water flying, filling 
<story>the store with steam… and the anticipation, it's 
<story>all more than I could have imagined!

data.text:
For bringing me here, I'm very very grateful. 
I can't thank you enough!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl

choices.text: I don't think I did anything that special…
choices.processed: <size=40>I don't think I did anything that special…</size>

data.processed:
<story>For bringing me here, I'm very very grateful. 
<story>I can't thank you enough!

data.text:
No, that's not true. 
… after all, I don't think I'll ever forget today!
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed:
<story>No, that's not true. 
<story>… after all, I don't think I'll ever forget today!

data.text:
And thus, this innocent girl with sparkling eyes, for some 
reason, her profile was burned into my mind…
data.processed:
<story>And thus, this innocent girl with sparkling eyes, for some 
<story>reason, her profile was burned into my mind…

data.text:
Ah, it's already dusk! That's a shame, there was 
one last place I was looking forward to though.
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl

choices.text: If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew
choices.processed: <size=33>If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew</size>

choices.text: If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew
choices.processed: <size=33>If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew</size>

data.processed:
<story>Ah, it's already dusk! That's a shame, there was 
<story>one last place I was looking forward to though.

data.text: That's true, curfews are normally like that, but in my case- Oh.
data.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>That's true, curfews are normally like that, but in my case- Oh.

data.text:
…Your Highness, excuse me. The agreement was that your outing 
would last until sun down. Please return to the dorm quickly.
data.processed:
<story>…Your Highness, excuse me. The agreement was that your outing 
<story>would last until sun down. Please return to the dorm quickly.

data.text:
…before I realized it, several suit-wearing adult 
uma musume were surrounding us. Up until now I 
never felt their presence though…!
data.processed:
<story>…before I realized it, several suit-wearing adult 
<story>uma musume were surrounding us. Up until now I 
<story>never felt their presence though…!

data.text:
And you, I apologize for interrupting you in 
the middle of your conversation. However-
data.name: Horsegirl in a Suit
data.processed:
<story>And you, I apologize for interrupting you in 
<story>the middle of your conversation. However-

data.text:
Her Highness, Fine Motion, is heir to the Royal Family. 
In the off chance, we can't have her exposing herself to danger.
data.name: Horsegirl in a Suit
data.processed:
<story>Her Highness, Fine Motion, is heir to the Royal Family. 
<story>In the off chance, we can't have her exposing herself to danger.

data.text:
…Thank you for the warning, Commander. Once we've finished 
exchanging pleasantries, I shall return to the dorm.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…Thank you for the warning, Commander. Once we've finished 
<story>exchanging pleasantries, I shall return to the dorm.

data.text:
Ehe. Sorry for surprising you. I'm truly thankful 
for today. It will be a very wonderful memory!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Ehe. Sorry for surprising you. I'm truly thankful 
<story>for today. It will be a very wonderful memory!

data.text: -This, is that gratitude!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>-This, is that gratitude!

data.text:
And thus, she placed something in my palm then 
closed my hand, and surrounded by the Suit-wearing 
Uma Musume, they headed to the station.
data.processed:
<story>And thus, she placed something in my palm then 
<story>closed my hand, and surrounded by the Suit-wearing 
<story>Uma Musume, they headed to the station.

data.text:
I saw them off while in a daze, then suddenly, 
I opened my palm. In it there was-
data.processed:
<story>I saw them off while in a daze, then suddenly, 
<story>I opened my palm. In it there was-

data.text: A coupon for a free extra serving of noodles.
data.processed: <story>A coupon for a free extra serving of noodles.

title: Every day is a new day.
